casebody.data:
Case No. 10,232. NICHOLLS v. JOHNS. [2 Cranch, C. C. 66.] 1 Circuit Court, District of Columbia. Dec. Term, 1812. [Cited in Miller’s Adm’r v. Norfolk & W. R. Co., 47 Fed. 266.]

[Reported by Hon. William Cranch, Chief Judge.]

Costs — Nonresident—Security.

The plaintiff having removed his family into the county of Washington, the rule for security for costs was stricken out, by leave of the court.
